title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.15 - Use of stable name
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.15 - Use of stable name

State Regulations

No individual shall race a horse under a stable name
unless such stable name is currently registered by such individual with The

Jockey Club. When, in the opinion of The Jockey Club, the use of a name
required to be registered with it would deceive or improperly mislead the
public, or would otherwise be contrary to the best interests of racing, it
shall so notify the commission, which shall take such action as it deems
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4026.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
